novel deep learning framework.from sentence: In this work 1 , we propose a novel deep learning framework named Multi - Center Learning ( MCL ) to exploit the strong correlations among landmarks .

multiple shape prediction layers.from sentence: Moreover , to decrease the model complexity , we propose a model assembling method to integrate multiple shape prediction layers into one shape prediction layer .

each shape prediction layer.from sentence: In particular , our network uses multiple shape prediction layers to predict the locations of landmarks , and each shape prediction layer emphasizes on the detection of a certain cluster of landmarks respectively .

reinforces.from sentence: The entire framework reinforces the learning process of each landmark with a low model complexity .

each landmark.from sentence: By weighting the loss of each landmark , challenging landmarks are focused firstly , and each cluster of landmarks is further optimized respectively .
